subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Lear’s Princess overtook the Belmont Stakes winner Rags to Riches and pulled off an upset Saturday in the Gazelle Stakes at Belmont Park in New York.
snippet: Lear’s Princess overtook the Belmont Stakes winner Rags to Riches and pulled off an upset Saturday in the Gazelle Stakes at Belmont Park in New York.
